name: @jaredlunde/example-server
description: A preconfigured Express + Webpack server for React application examples
author: Jared Lunde

scripts.build: yarn build:api & yarn build:react & yarn build:shared
scripts.build:api: rimraf api && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production babel api-src --out-dir ./api
scripts.build:react: rimraf react && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production babel react-src --out-dir ./react
